# timeRange

**Instance Property**

The time range within the asset to read.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeRange: CMTimeRange { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is a time range with a start time of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/zero] and a duration of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/positiveInfinity].

You can’t modify this value after reading starts.

## Configuring reading

- **status**: The status of reading sample buffers from the asset.
- **AVAssetReader.Status**: Values that represent the possible states of an asset reader.
- **error**: An error that describes the reason for a failure.
